name: @pagerduty/incident-command-center
description: Real-time PagerDuty incident management dashboard with AI-powered insights

scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && cross-env INPUT=mcp-app.html vite build
scripts.start: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development INPUT=mcp-app.html vite build --watch" "tsx watch main.ts"
